Perceptor/Blackstorm:

Perceptor nodded and started to check Hydras status.

When Blackstorm heard her name, she appeared behind Maxima and 
said "Is that you, Maxima? By the pit, what a nice look..."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/21/03 11:32:24 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Perceptor followed her and said "I love that you liked my master 
> > art, by now" hissed the male"Why don't you test your new 
weaponry 
> > while you train with Blackstorm... "
> > 
> 
> She glanced at Perceptor. "In due time, Perceptor." 
> 
> Though a test or comradery would be good for this old bot to 
mingle with the 
> younger bots. "Informing me immediately when Hydras awakens." 
> 
> With that, she walked by Hydras' CR, watching the leader a moment. 
His wounds 
> best heal or she would NEVER forgive Rodimus for another time. 
Rodimus had 
> done more than enough damage. 
> 
> Striding to the door she left the room in search for Blackstorm. 
Opening a 
> com to the fembot. "Maxima to Blackstorm. Respond!" 
> 
> OOC: BTW. I did upload a drawing of Maxima in her new form, not 
colored & 
> rather rough actually, to the Photos on the Yahoogroups page under 
the Maxima 
> album. Check it out.. it's the tigerhawk look alike.
